Jatim Buka 1.817 CPNS, Sebagian Besar Guru
04 Nov 2019, 19:39 by Anik Hasanah


Jatim Buka 1.817 CPNS, Sebagian Besar Guru

KBRN, Surabaya : Provinsi Jawa Timur akan membuka lowongan Calon Pegawai Negeri Sipil (CPNS) sebanyak 1.817 formasi, pada penerimaan November 2019 ini. Kepala Badan Kepegawaian Daerah (BKD) Jatim, Anom Surahno menjelaskan, sebagian besar formasi yang dibutuhkan tersebut, adalah tenaga pendidik atau guru, yakni sebanyak 1.133 orang. "Yang kedua kesehatan, yang ketiga teknis. Teknis paling sedikit," ujarnya kepada RRI Surabaya, Senin (4/11/2019).Posisi guru yang dibutuhkan, lanjut Anom, hampir merata disetiap mata pelajaran, dan juga setiap Kabupaten Kota untuk tingkat SMA. "Tersebar kalau guru, kan SMA di semua Kabupaten Kota, Provinsi kan mengampu guru guru SMA se Jawa Timur. Ada matematika (guru), bahasa, macem macem," tuturnya. Proses perekrutan akan dimulai sejak tanggal 11 November 2019. Dimana merupakan pengumuman formasi yang dibutuhkan, oleh Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara - Reformasi Birokrasi (Kemenpan RB)."Lalu masyarakat baru menentukan formasi itu, lalu daftar lewat online," imbuhnya. Anom menghimbau kepada masyarakat calon pendaftar CPNS untuk tidak percaya dengan janji orang lain yang menawarkan kemudahan lolos tanpa tes, namun harus membayar sejumlah uang. "Tidak ada janji, semua dilakukan secara mandiri lewat online. Sehingga masyarakat dihimbau untuk tidak melakukan tindakan percaya terhadap kelompok tertentu atau orang yang menjanjikan akan membantu, gak ada, semuanya dilakukan secara mandiri," pesannya.

East Java Open 1,817 CPNS, Most Teachers
Nov. 04 2019, 19:39 by Anik Hasanah


East Java Open 1,817 CPNS, Most Teachers

KBRN, Surabaya: East Java Province will open vacancies for 1,817 formation Civil Servants (CPNS), at the reception this November 2019. The Head of East Java Regional Personnel Agency (BKD), Anom Surahno explained, most of the required formations were educators or teachers, as many as 1,133 people. "The second is health, the third is technical. The least technical," he told RRI Surabaya, Monday (11/04/2019). The position of the teachers needed, continued Anom, was almost evenly distributed in each subject, and also every City District for the high school level . "It is spread when teachers, high schools in all regencies of the city, the province can help high school teachers in East Java. There is mathematics (teacher), language, and everything," he said. The recruitment process will begin on November 11, 2019. Which is the announcement of the formation needed, by the Ministry of Administrative Reform - Bureaucratic Reform (Kemenpan RB). "Then the new community determines the formation, then registers online," he added. Anom appealed to prospective CPNS applicants to not believe in the promises of others who offer the convenience of passing without a test, but must pay a sum of money. "There is no promise, everything is done independently through online. So the public is advised not to take action to believe in certain groups or people who promise to help, nothing, everything is done independently," he said.
